page.title: 06NTH. KILWORTH NURSING HOME.
page.content: The Home is housed in a large building which was the old rectory. It became a nursing home under its previouse occupants, Dr. & Mrs Stubbs. The present owner, Mrs.Pratt,has extended it by having the stables and outbuldings converted to give more accommodation space. Between twelve and twenty people are resident at any one time. They are mainly very old people. One sees them walking around the village, and some attend school plays.Some of the staff are resident, and some come in daily. {Health Care For Kilworth } The nearest Doctor is in Husbands Bosworth.(2 miles). There are doctors, dentists, a chemist and an optician in Lutterworth(5 miles). TThe children at the school have regular medical inspections,and screening for eye and hearing defects.
